name: Fiend
description: A balor strikes from the depths of the Abyss. This card alludes to an actual Fiend or the forces of the Lower Planes.

person: A tiefling, warlock of the Fiend, member of a Fiend-worshiping cult, or person who seeks to manipulate others into harmful contracts.
A person who carries a grudge over a real or perceived injury caused by a Fiend, or a person trapped in a bargain with a Fiend.
creatureTrap: A redeemed Fiend or similar creature that has lost its connection to the Lower Planes.
place: A place on the Lower Planes, or a location suffused with their influence.
A place intended to ward off Fiends and influence from the Lower Planes.
treasure: An art object depicting Fiends, treasure from the Lower Planes, or magic items made by Fiends.
A treasure depicting a Fiend's redemption, or a magic item useful against Fiends.
situation: Interaction between the Lower Planes and the Material Plane perhaps an infernal bargain or demonic destruction.
A situation involving Fiends' unwelcome interference in mortal affairs.
